overview:
Serial entrepreneur and innovation developer with a mobile web 2.0 business focus.

Broad experience working in and with multi-national mobile operators/carriers, internet, IT and consulting companies. Inge Andre Sandvik have been responsible for successfully launching awarded mobile services internationally and that won the GSMA mobile innovation award for best mobile consumer application in 2009. His main strength is ability to see innovations and opportunites and then execute on them. He has proven over years to succesfully take ideas from start to end.

He founded Mobile Nordic and was CEO until he took the role as Cheif Strategy Officer. Mobile Nordic has internationally rolled out a award winning mobile application and content service in the Nordic and EMEA market with partners such as Nokia, SonyEricsson, Samsung, Google, Telenor, Telia, 3 and Tele2.

Prior to Mobile Nordic, Inge Andre Sandvik was the Co-founder and CEO of Mobile CTI, a innovative mobile directory search company that invented the awarded mobile application service “See who is calling” for mobile phones. The company is now acquired by Opplysningen 1881 (owned by Telenor Venture).

His work background contain experience from Compaq, PwC Consulting and Telenor.
